name: Fynn and Thorin Amiga
description:
Fynn and Thorin

A  little 2 Player Amiga game for Children. I made it for my two sons :-)

 Version 1 needs an Amiga with Kickstart 1.3 and 1 MB Ram. It is in German. 

Version 2 needs an Amiga with Kickstart 3.1 and 1 MB Ram. It is in german and english (sorry for my bad english ;-) ). 

You can put it on floppy disk with "adfblitzer" on the Amiga or play it with Winuae oder Fsuae on Mac or Windows.

You Play it with Joystick.
